trans-unit.source: Enable automatic scaling on a pool
trans-unit.target: Enable automatic scaling on a pool

trans-unit.source: Enables automatic scaling for a pool.
trans-unit.target: Enables automatic scaling for a pool.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to pools.

trans-unit.source: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that you want to update.
trans-unit.target: Replace {pool-id} with the id of the pool that you want to update.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an Enable Autoscale request whose formula increases the number of nodes that are used by 10% when the CPU usage in the pool for past 10 minutes stays over 70%.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows an Enable Autoscale request whose formula increases the number of nodes that are used by 10% when the CPU usage in the pool for past 10 minutes stays over 70%.

trans-unit.source: Specifies a formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies a formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.

trans-unit.source: The formula is checked for validity before it is applied to the pool.
trans-unit.target: The formula is checked for validity before it is applied to the pool.

trans-unit.source: If the formula is not valid, the Batch service rejects the request with detailed error information.
trans-unit.target: If the formula is not valid, the Batch service rejects the request with detailed error information.

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying this formula, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale compute nodes in an Azure Batch pool.</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: For more information about specifying this formula, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale compute nodes in an Azure Batch pool.</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>

trans-unit.source: You cannot enable automatic scaling on a pool if a resize operation is in progress on the pool.
trans-unit.target: You cannot enable automatic scaling on a pool if a resize operation is in progress on the pool.
